description.value: You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead. You're always taking precautions when @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Avoid Notice]{Avoiding Notice}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Hide]{Hiding}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Sneak]{Sneaking} to foil lifesense, and you're @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} to any creature using only precise lifesense to observe you.
